title: Game crashes as soon as I open it or won't open at all.
body: Stopped working today. When I open the game (when successful), it will start patching and then says error, and when I try again it restarts and keeps doing that. And now it won't open at all - saying pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working.  I don't know what's wrong??? I tried transferring someone else's copy of the game but it is doing the same thing.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support article for me, let me know if this helps.
